name: Hari Narain Ravikumar
bio: Hari Narain Ravikumar is currently doing his Graduate studies at UT Dallas.  He finished his bachelors from NIT Raipur, India. He lead the Students placements office during those years and was instrumental in 100% placement record in 2010. An Engineer by choice and a passionate marketing person too. An Ex-entrepreneur and a huge Chelsea FC fan. Always a traveller. Social, outgoing, explorer and wanderer.
